pullrequest.title: Bullet: Fixed joints and inertia matrices with non-zero values on their off-diagonal

content.raw: I  am not sure, but the original bug \(unexpected rotation when using a non-diagonal inertia matrix\) could also be related to the changes introduced in this PR: [#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2757/support-off-diagonal-inertia-terms-in/diff](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2757/support-off-diagonal-inertia-terms-in/diff) .
content.html: I am not sure, but the original bug (unexpected rotation when using a non-diagonal inertia matrix) could also be related to the changes introduced in this PR: #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2757/support-off-diagonal-inertia-terms-in/diff .
